1617550.name: RPG Maker MZ - Fantasy Beasts
1617550.description:
Are you on the lookout for vicious new creatures for your next RPG? Look no further than the Fantasy Beasts Pack by Red Mouse, featuring 12 beasts with face sets and battle-ready stances. Each of the monsters also feature multiple color sets to choose from for preference or to indicate different levels of strengths – whatever fits best for the strategy you are developing around your enemies. The Fantasy Beasts pack includes inspirations of Raptors, Wolves, Lizards and more! There is even a three headed Hydra for those seeking a foe that strikes fear into the minds of its players!

Features:

* 10 Face sets + 2 additional Hydra face sets with different shades
* 10 Battlers in 6 different shades and colors

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1617550.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
